abstract: New York State Supreme Court Justice Juan M Merchan fines Andrew Rossig and James Brady $2,000 each and orders they complete 200 and 250 hours of community service, respectively, for parachuting off 1 World Trade Center in 2013; third jumper Marko Markovich still has yet to be sentenced.
lead_paragraph: Andrew Rossig and James Brady were fined $2,000 each and ordered to perform hundreds of hours of community service for their September 2013 leap.

headline.main: 2 Who Parachuted Off World Trade Center Tower Avoid Jail Time
headline.print_headline: Judge Rebukes 2 Sky Divers but Spares Them Jail Time for Trade Center Jump

snippet: Andrew Rossig and James Brady were fined $2,000 each and ordered to perform hundreds of hours of community service for their September 2013 leap.
